description:
Konohamaru, the grandson of the Leaf Village`s Third Hokage, shows up at the Chunin Exam site.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le journal de l`école de Konoha
Sonderbericht: Live aus dem Wald des Schreckens
Special Report: Live from the Forest of Death!
Un articolo prima del secondo test
Zettai Hikken! Shi no Mori Chokuzen Rupo! Konoha no Gakkyuu Shinbun Da Kore!

絶対必見! 死の森直前ルポ! 木ノ葉の学級新聞だコレ!
